451701585f2d2833921a7b3bd274aafa (14:30): The encoding algorithm for mailto links, as specified, consists of two steps.
451701585f2d2833921a7b3bd274aafa (14:30): The first step is encoding the control values normally, and the second step is to transform all occurrences of + to %20.
451701585f2d2833921a7b3bd274aafa (14:31): This is equivalent to making an exception in the first algorithm.
